m_szDocTitle: Toyota Prius Buyers Hop Into Tesla Model S's | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Originally published on Gas 2 . The Toyota Prius has been the perennial best seller for green-minded drivers, but the Tesla Model S is stealing buyers from the Japanese hybrid. Even though many Tesla buyers come from German luxury brands, the Model S is attracting most of its customers from Toyota. As a new brand, Tesla has to pull from a pool of established buyers, and Toyota is one of the top-three best-selling car brands around the world every year.
